name: Survive A Minute!
description:
Santa is very very angry with you for being a very bad boy. Can you survive for just one minute with him out for your blood? Collect rare and valuable gifts,  teleport to safety through the boxes, hide in them to survive, and keep that clock ticking for a minute! Oh, and try to ignore the threats about being turned into a reindeer. Merry Christmas!

Controls (Important!):

Arrow keys to move

Touch a box to hide inside it. If your air runs out, you die.

Press Ctrl+arrow key to exit a box in a particular direction. 

If you find a gift, press x to use it

The lightning bolts are speed boosters

The time tracker is on the top right.

You have to exit the game and open it again to restart.

TIP: If there's a row or column of boxes, you can teleport through with ctrl+arrow key.

A small game made for the Jame Gam Christmas Editon.
